newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: CRICKET-BORDER BATTING FIRST AGAINST GRIQUAS.
newsitem.headline: CRICKET-BORDER BATTING FIRST AGAINST GRIQUAS.

text.p: Border captain Pieter Strydom won the toss and elected to bat first in their Supersport series cricket match against Griqualand West at Buffalo Park on Friday.
Border - Piet Botha, Brad White, Craig Wilson, Peter Kirsten, Mark Boucher, Pieter Strydom, Steven Pope, Ian Howell, Peter Emslie, Dion Taljard, Makhaya Ntini.
Griqualand West - Mickey Arthur, Martyn Gidley, Pieter Barnard, Willie Dry, Finley Brooker, Wendell Bossenger, Cedric English, Vaugh Walsh, Garth Roe, Brett Benkenstein, Adri Swanepoel.
